document_data.name: Sadrach
document_data.mainbody: '''Sadrach''' was a [[wizard]] who lived in [[Faerûn]] during the 14{{th}} and 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]]. He was a famous scholar of [[elemental magic]], who dwelled within his own [[Sadrach's Splinter|personal castle]] in [[south Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: He venerated the four [[elemental lord]]s; [[Akadi]], [[Grumbar]], [[Istishia]], and [[Kossuth]]. He maintained four separate temples dedicated to each of them within his castle.
document_data.Personality: He was a confidant and learned man in life, who became filled with unrelenting rage while living in a cursed state of existence.
document_data.Relationships: His only known relative was his daughter [[Gingrid]], a young [[necromancer]] who was granted unnaturally long longevity and youth.{{Template:Cite book/The Sentinel/Hardcover|280}}
